Title: [L03] Missing docstrings
Content:
There are some instances throughout the codebase where the [Ethereum Natural Specification](https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/develop/natspec-format.html) is missing or incomplete. Examples include:


* the [`BridgeDepositBox`](https://github.com/UMAprotocol/protocol/blob/f24ad501c8e813cf685f72217e7f13c8f3c366df/packages/core/contracts-ovm/insured-bridge/implementation/BridgeDepositBox.sol#L98), [`AVM_BridgeDepositBox`](https://github.com/UMAprotocol/protocol/blob/f24ad501c8e813cf685f72217e7f13c8f3c366df/packages/core/contracts-ovm/insured-bridge/implementation/AVM_BridgeDepositBox.sol#L38) and [`OVM_BridgeDepositBox`](https://github.com/UMAprotocol/protocol/blob/f24ad501c8e813cf685f72217e7f13c8f3c366df/packages/core/contracts-ovm/insured-bridge/implementation/OVM_BridgeDepositBox.sol#L37) constructors are missing a `@param` comment for the `_l1Weth` parameter.
* the [`BridgePool` constructor](https://github.com/UMAprotocol/protocol/blob/f24ad501c8e813cf685f72217e7f13c8f3c366df/packages/core/contracts/insured-bridge/BridgePool.sol#L159) is missing a `@param` comment for the `_isWethPool` parameter.


Consider thoroughly documenting all functions (and their parameters) that are part of the contracts’ public API.


**Update:** *The highlighted comments were fixed in commit [`e943e85a7dae60acd17a6d6aa027fbb1017c95ee`](https://github.com/UMAprotocol/protocol/pull/3533/commits/e943e85a7dae60acd17a6d6aa027fbb1017c95ee) of [PR3533](https://github.com/UMAprotocol/protocol/pull/3533). We did not validate NatSpec completeness in the rest of the code base.*
